name: Crazy Priest
overview: CRAZY PRIEST, initially previewed as a playable demo at the RetroKomp/Load Error 2015 demo party, was released as a full PD/freeware game two years later at the RetroKomp/Load Error 2017 demo party in Poland. The game was ranked a very respectable 3rd in the RetroKomp GameDev Compo. Consist of 2 modes - single player and multiplayer. Seeking...collect and destroy!
